text: The 2019 Israel Super Cup is the 24th Israel Super Cup https://us.soccerway.com/national/israel/super-cup/20192020/s16465/final- stages/ (29th, including unofficial matches, as the competition wasn't played within the Israel Football Association in its first 5 editions, until 1969), an annual Israel football match played between the winners of the previous season's Top Division and Israel State Cup.Soccer Website showing the teams This is the fourth time since 1990 that the match was staged after a planned resumption of the cup was canceled in 2014. The game was played between Maccabi Tel Aviv, champions of the 2018–19 Israeli Premier League and Bnei Yehuda Tel Aviv, winners of the 2018–19 Israeli State Cup.An article in Hebrew Tel Aviv won 1-0. ==Match details== {| width=92% |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK ||17|| Andreas Gianniotis |- |RB ||30|| Maor Kandil |- |CB ||21|| Sheran Yeini (c) |- |CB ||31|| Shahar Piven |- |LB ||20 || Matan Baltaxa |- |DM ||6|| Dan Glazer |- |CM ||77|| Roslan Barsky |- |LM ||15|| Dor Micha |- |RW ||45|| Matan Hozez |- |CF ||24|| Yonatan Cohen |- |LF ||25 || Aaron Schoenfeld |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |GK ||19|| Daniel Miller Tenenbaum |- |DF ||27|| Ofir Davidzada |- |DF ||3 || Jair Amador |- |MF ||42|| Dor Peretz |- |MF ||22 || Avi Rikan |- |FW ||16|| Eliran Atar |- |FW ||11|| Itay Shechter |- |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=3| Vladimir Ivić |} |valign="top"| | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"| |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK ||1|| Emilijus Zubas |- |RB ||16|| Avishay Cohen |- |CB ||2|| Dan Mori (c) |- |CB ||5|| Daniel Flesher |- |LB ||77 || Paz Ben Ari |- |DM ||6|| Amir Rustum |- |CM ||19|| Ismaila Soro |- |LM ||18 || Eithan Velblum |- |RW ||10|| Amit Zenati |- |CF ||8|| Shay Mazor |- |FW ||9|| Dor Jan |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |GK ||55|| Yehonatan Shabi |- |DF ||26 || Roi Ben Shimon |- |MF ||21|| Sagas Tambi |- |MF ||23 || Ben Shimoni |- |MF ||15|| Ariel Lazmi |- |MF ||7|| Nehoray Gigi |- |FW ||77 || Rom Anu |- |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=3| Yossi Abuksis |} |} {| width=100% style="font-size: 90%" | width=50% valign=top| Man of the Match: * MATCH OFFICIALS *Assistant referees: **Omer Barbiro **Tom Adi *Fourth official: **Yigal Frid | width=50% valign=top| Match rules *90 minutes. *Penalty shoot- out if scores level. *Seven named substitutes, of which up to three may be used. |} ==References== Category:2019–20 in Israeli football Super Cup 2019 Super Cup 2019 Category:Israel Super Cup Israel Super Cup Category:Israel Super Cup matches Israel Super Cup 2018
